keyMoments.title: Deduces Perona's True Body Location
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses his observation and deduction skills to realize that the Perona he's fighting is merely a ghost form, and that her physical body must be hidden elsewhere.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's tactical intelligence and analytical abilities, setting up his victory strategy.
keyMoments.quote: That's it! The Perona I've been fighting is just a ghost! Her real body must be hidden somewhere safe!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Torimochi Boshi
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires Torimochi Boshi (Birdlime Star) at Perona's physical body in a move that appears to miss but is actually part of his trap.
keyMoments.significance: Debuts a new technique that uses adhesive to immobilize opponents, showcasing Usopp's growing arsenal.
keyMoments.quote: Did you really think I missed? That was Torimochi Boshi - your arm is stuck to the wall! You can't escape now!

keyMoments.title: Uses Impact Dial from Skypiea
keyMoments.description: Usopp reveals he kept the Impact Dial from the Skypiea arc and uses it to absorb Perona's explosive attack, demonstrating his strategic preparation.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's foresight in keeping and utilizing equipment from previous adventures, emphasizing the continuity of the Straw Hats' journey.
keyMoments.quote: Impact Dial! I've been saving this for just the right moment!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Gokiburi Boshi
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses Gokiburi Boshi (Cockroach Star) to cover Perona with hundreds of fake cockroaches, exploiting her fear of insects.
keyMoments.significance: Debuts a psychological warfare technique that showcases Usopp's understanding that the greatest weapon is often fear itself.
keyMoments.quote: Gokiburi Boshi! Time to see what really scares you, Ghost Princess!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Usopp Golden Pound
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses an inflatable hammer disguised as a massive ten-ton weapon to complete his psychological assault on Perona.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the culmination of Usopp's trickster fighting style, where the threat of violence is more effective than actual violence.
keyMoments.quote: Usopp Golden Pound! This ten-ton hammer will finish you!

keyMoments.title: Defeats Perona
keyMoments.description: Usopp successfully defeats one of Moria's Mysterious Four through pure psychological warfare, without causing any real physical damage.
keyMoments.significance: One of Usopp's most impressive solo victories, proving his worth as a combatant who uses intelligence over strength.
keyMoments.quote: Victory! The Great Captain Usopp triumphs again!

abilities.description: A sticky adhesive projectile that immobilizes targets by gluing them to surfaces.
Fires hundreds of fake toy cockroaches to psychologically intimidate and terrorize opponents.
An inflatable balloon disguised as a massive ten-ton hammer used for psychological warfare.

reveals.information: Demonstrates mastery of psychological warfare and deception-based combat
Kept and learned to use Impact Dial from Skypiea arc

keyMoments.title: Uses Toku Hollow
keyMoments.description: Perona creates a massive Special Hollow (Toku Hollow) that is at least four times the size of Usopp to trap him.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals one of Perona's most powerful ghost techniques, showing the full extent of her Horo Horo no Mi abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Meet my Special Hollow! You can't escape from its grip!

keyMoments.title: Uses Kamikaze Rap
keyMoments.description: Perona detonates her Special Hollow using Kamikaze Rap, creating a massive explosion.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the lethal explosive capability of her ghost abilities.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Usopp
keyMoments.description: Perona is defeated through psychological warfare when Usopp exploits her fear of cockroaches and uses an inflatable hammer to make her faint from terror.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Perona's removal from the Thriller Bark battles, reducing Moria's forces and demonstrating that psychological weaknesses can overcome powerful abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Please spare me! I'm sorry! Don't hit me with that!

abilities.description: Creates a massive Special Hollow ghost that can trap and grab opponents.
Detonates her hollows to create powerful explosions.

reveals.information: Intense fear of cockroaches and insects
Can separate her ghost form from physical body, but physical body is vulnerable when separated
